original_title: Dr. Saman Ratnayake remanded until March 14
original_body_lines: Additional Secretary of the Health Ministry Dr. Saman Ratnayake who was arrested over the import of substandard human Immunoglobulin injections, has been remanded until March 14.
He was ordered to be remanded when he was produced before the Maligakanda Magistrate’s Court this morning.
The Criminal Investigations Department (CID) arrested Dr Ratnayake yesterday after he arrived at the CID to provide a statement.
